items.summary: Update the appâ€™s primary site URL configuration so the canonical public URL is exactly https://prasadenterprise-epm.caffeine.xyz/ (including updating `SITE_CONFIG.url` in `frontend/src/config/site.ts`).

Update all internal links or any hardcoded absolute URLs throughout the frontend to use the https://prasadenterprise-epm.caffeine.xyz/ domain (where absolute URLs are used), and remove/replace any remaining references to the old domains `https://prasadenterprise.caffeine.xyz`, `https://www.prasadenterprise.caffeine.xyz`, and any draft URLs such as `https://significant-blush-1gq-draft.caffeine.xyz/`.

Ensure the admin area remains reachable on the new domain and that any user-facing guidance or navigation that points to the admin area uses the new domain (domain only; do not change admin paths unless already required elsewhere).
